localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.body:
When Tesla joins the S&P 500 next Monday it will have the 6th largest market cap ($642 billion), trailing only Apple/Microsoft/Amazon/Google/Facebook.

Its Net Income of $556 million will rank 319th.

Its Price to Sales Ratio of 24x will be 4th highest.

$TSLA

Chart via @ycharts https://t.co/8Y15REo7HA
blogPost.title:
When Tesla joins the S&P 500 next Monday it will have the 6th largest market cap ($642 billion), trailing only Apple/Microsoft/Amazon/Google/Facebook.

Its Net Income of $556 million will rank 319th.

Its Price to Sales Ratio of 24x will be 4th highest.

$TSLA

Chart via @ycharts https://t.co/8Y15REo7HA
blogPost.author: Charlie Bilello

localize.full_text:
下周一，当特斯拉加入标准普尔500指数时，它将拥有全球第六大市值(6420亿美元)，仅次于苹果(Apple)/微软(Microsoft)/亚马逊(Amazon)/谷歌(Google)/Facebook。

其5.56亿美元的净收入将排在第319位。

它的24倍的价格销售比将是第四高的。

美国电话服务级别协议

图表通过@ycharts https://t.co/8Y15REo7HA

下週一，當特斯拉加入標準普爾500指數時，它將擁有全球第六大市值(6420億美元)，僅次於蘋果(Apple)/微軟(Microsoft)/亞馬遜(Amazon)/谷歌(Google)/Facebook。

其5.56億美元的淨收入將排在第319位。

它的24倍的價格銷售比將是第四高的。

美國電話服務級別協議

圖表通過@ycharts https://t.co/8Y15REo7HA

previous.excerpt:
Breaking major news from US Treasury OCC, the largest US banking regulator, with
new guidance allowing US banks to use public blockchains and dollar stablecoins
as a settlement infrastructure in the US financial system.

https://www.occ.gov/news-issuances/news-releases/2021/nr-occ-2021-2.html
previous.title: US Treasury OCC will allow US banks to use public blockchains and stablecoins as a settlement infrastructure in the US financial system

localize.title: 美国财政部OCC将允许美国银行使用公共区块链和稳定密码作为美国金融体系中的结算基础设施
localize.the_new_excerpt:
美国最大银行业监管机构--美国财政部OCC发布重大消息，
允许美国银行使用公共区块链和美元稳定码的新指导
作为美国金融体系中的结算基础设施。

https://www.occ.gov/news-issuances/news-releases/2021/nr-occ-2021-2.html

localize.title: 美國財政部OCC將允許美國銀行使用公共區塊鏈和穩定密碼作爲美國金融體系中的結算基礎設施
localize.the_new_excerpt:
美國最大銀行業監管機構--美國財政部OCC發佈重大消息，
允許美國銀行使用公共區塊鏈和美元穩定碼的新指導
作爲美國金融體系中的結算基礎設施。

https://www.occ.gov/news-issuances/news-releases/2021/nr-occ-2021-2.html
